title: About Atid Raziel Orchestra
subtitle: Inspiring young musicians through orchestral excellence and cultural heritage
heroDescription: A community of talented young musicians dedicated to excellence
conductorDescription: Lev Arshtein has been leading the orchestra since its founding, bringing his passion and expertise to inspire young musicians.
description1: The Atid Raziel Orchestra was founded with the mission to provide young musicians with professional orchestral experience while preserving our rich musical heritage.
description2: Our performances blend classical masterpieces with contemporary works, creating a unique musical experience that resonates with audiences of all backgrounds.
